statements: DELETE FROM NFTs WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice' AND nft_creation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM nfts WHERE id = 10 AND owner_id = 25
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE nft_id = 50 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND nft_id = 'f7e510e5-1a99-438d-98ed-0c2582a4b70d';
DELETE FROM nft_history WHERE nft_id = 'f7e510e5-1a99-438d-98ed-0c2582a4b70d' AND history_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM nfts WHERE owner_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'alice');
